problem_data.title: Making A Large Island
problem_data.description:
You are given an n x n binary matrix grid. You are allowed to change at most one 0 to be 1.

Return the size of the largest island in grid after applying this operation.

An island is a 4-directionally connected group of 1s.

examples.explanation: Change one 0 to 1 and connect two 1s, then we get an island with area = 3.
Change the 0 to 1 and make the island bigger, only one island with area = 4.
Can't change any 0 to 1, only one island with area = 4.
